title: Olympic Summer Games - revenue generated from domestic sponsorships 1996 to 2016
yAxis: Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic shows the Summer Games Domestic of the generated of Olympic Summer Games from 1996_Atlanta to 2016_Rio .
The average Domestic of the generated is predicted to rise continuously over this 25 Year period , with the sharpest rise between 2012_London and 2016_Rio , of 0.9 years .
gold: The statistic shows the revenue generated from domestic sponsorships at the Olympic Summer Games from 1996 to 2016.
The 2016 Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro generated about 848 million U.S. dollars in sponsorship revenues .
